entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Esther
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:38 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Esther 07:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -9.5°C
Wind: ESE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Fog dissipating late this morning then mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
